MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH2 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:02pm. Our engineers have arrived at Canning Street substation to investigate a possible blown fuse and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:05pm on Tuesday, 17 November 2020
